About Me

I am a Computer Science Grad student at University of Southern California, Viterbi School of Engineering. I have 1 year of Professional Software Developement experience and 5+ years of coding experience.

Research

I love working with the data. So, I became Volunteer Researcher at USC Database Lab during this Summer 2020 guided by Professor. Shahram Ghandeharizadeh. We, a team of 5 developed a platform using ETL and Google Map API to help service providers to increase their income during a pandemic. For this, we used USA Population Data. It was really challenging to clean the data and use them for the project. To increase the efficiency of the database search we used indexing for our database. Later, we worked on to develop a user friendly Google's Dialogflow prototype to help users develop their own chat bots in our platform.

Education

M.S. in Computer Science (Data Science), University of Southern California
B.E. in Computer Science Engineering, SKCET, Anna University

Selected Projects

Artificial Intelligence Agent

Developed anAI agent for 5x5 GO gamewhich defeats all kinds of player and the win rate is 95%. Used Alpha Beta pruning and minimax algorithm to develop this agent.


Neural Network

Implemented a Neural Network from scratch without using any libraries to detect handwritten MNIST dataset that resulted in 98.3% accuracy.


Weather Bot

Coded a telegram bot to add regions and sends weather alert at a particular time of a day.


IoT based Vertical Farming

Developed an automatic irrigation system using Internet of Things and sensors to reduce water usage in Vertical Farming.

Personal

My name is சரவணன் ( sah-ra-vah-nun) and I am from Erode, Tamil Nadu, India.

Aquascaping, gardening used to be my stress busters. I have grown a variety of plants and bred lot of fishes. I am always open to talk and I try to understand human Psychology.

If I’m not working, I binge watch sitcoms. I am a tea connoisseur and I crave for fried chicken all the time.
